# <a name="create-an-email-signature-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="43d5c-102">Outlook on the web でメール署名を作成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43d5c-102">Create an email signature in Outlook on the web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="43d5c-103">移動先</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43d5c-103">Go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="43d5c-104">[**設定**] > [**Outlook のすべての設定を表示**] > [**作成と返信**] の順に移動します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43d5c-104">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **Compose and reply**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="43d5c-105">[**メールの署名**] 欄にお客様の署名を入力し、使用可能な書式設定オプションを使って署名の外観を変更します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43d5c-105">Under **Email signature**, type your signature and use the available formatting options to change its appearance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43d5c-106">*注:* 署名はアカウントごとに 1 つだけ含めることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43d5c-106">*Note:* You can have only one signature per account.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43d5c-107">詳しくは、「[Outlook on the web でメール署名を作成、追加する](https://support.office.com/article/5ff9dcfd-d3f1-447b-b2e9-39f91b074ea3)」をご覧ください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43d5c-107">To learn more, see [Create and add an email signature in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/5ff9dcfd-d3f1-447b-b2e9-39f91b074ea3).</span></span>
